FuncDef:
The anti-attack tcp-syn car command sets the rate limit at which TCP SYN packets are received.
The undo anti-attack tcp-syn car command restores the default rate limit at which TCP SYN packets are received. The anti-attack tcp-syn car command sets the rate limit at which TCP SYN packets are received. The undo anti-attack tcp-syn car command restores the default rate limit at which TCP SYN packets are received. By default, the rate limit at which TCP SYN packets are received is 155000000 bit/s.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the CIR.
Integer type. Range: 8000-155000000. The default value is 155000000, in bit/s.
